channel.title: k8s on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in k8s on Notes

item.title: Kubernetes
item.description: Basics Kubernetes is the operating system for cloud-native applications. Configuration cat ~/.kube/config # or kubectl config view Namespace group of objects in a cluster similar to a filesystem folder see Namespaces for more # your current namespace kubectl config get-contexts # search for asterisk and see column NAMESPACE # all namespaces in a cluster kubectl get namespaces Context to change the default namespace more permanently to manage different clusters to manage different users
